decision_conditions:
Condition 2 of P2019/2531/FUL should now read:

CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

Planning statement 24 Sept 2019 (part superseded), Design and Access Statement - Buckley Gray Yeoman 2019 (part superseded); ( Archaeology Statement - MOLA 03 July 2020, Cover letter - DP9 19 Aug 2019 (part superseded)  Cover letter - DP9 10 July 2020, Daylight and Sunlight Report - Anstey Horne ref MG//GI/ROL7071 dated 08 July 2020, Draft Construction Method Statement Cogent BC July 2020, Green Performance Plan - Watkins Payne Issue 2 Draft July 2020, Heritage Statement - Donald Insall Associates July 2020, Noise Impact Assessment - Clarke Saunders AS10232.200602.NIA dated 07 July 2020, Structural Statement - Heyne Tillett Steel 03/07/2020, Sustainable Design and Construction Statement - Watkins Payne Issue 2 July 2020, Ventilation and Extraction Philosophy - Watkins Payne Issue 2 July 2020, Design and Access Statement Addendum - Buckley Gray Yeoman 9th July 2020, Design and Access Statement Appendices - Buckley Gray Yeoman 17th July 2020, Site Location Plan 1002_PL_S 01 rev P2, Demolition - Basement plan 1002_DE B1 rev P2, Ground floor plan 1002_DE 00 rev P2, First floor plan 1002_DE 01 rev P2, Second floor plan 1002_DE 02 rev P2, Third floor plan 1002_DE 03 rev P2, Fourth floor plan 1002_DE 04 rev P2, Roof plan 1002_DE RF rev P2, North elevation 1002_DE_EE 01 rev P2, South elevation 1002_DE_EE 02 rev P2, East elevation 1002_DE_EE 03 rev P2, West elevation 1002_DE_EE 04 rev P2, Section AA 1002_DE_ES AA rev P2, Section DD 1002_DE_ES DD rev P2, Section EE 1002_DE_ES EE rev P2, Proposed drawings - Basement plan 1002_PL_GA B1 rev P2, Ground floor plan 1002_PL_GA 00 rev P4, First floor plan 1002_PL_GA 01 rev P2, Second floor plan 1002_PL_GA 02 rev P2, Third floor plan 1002_PL_GA 03 rev P2, Fourth floor plan 1002_PL_GA 04 rev P2, Roof plan 1002_PL_GA RF rev P4, North elevation 1002_PL_GE 01 rev P2, South elevation 1002_PL_GE 02 rev P2, East elevation 1002_PL_GE 03 rev P2, West elevation 1002_PL_GE 04 rev P2, Section AA 1002_PL_GS AA rev P2, Section DD 1002_PL_GS DD rev P3, Section EE 1002_PL_GS EE rev P3. Blackdown green roof systems - biodiverse green roof, Green roof details - 1002_PL_ED_47 rev P2.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
description: Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref: P2019/2531/FUL dated 06/11/2020. The proposed amendment comprises of provision of a green roof.
